toc.envision_location: Eiffel ENViSioN!\Developing with Eiffel ENViSioN!\Adding a New Project\Advanced GUI Project Wizard\Interface Construction Page\How To's

paragraph.paragraph:
To remove an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object from your EiffelBuild system,
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop pick the object you wish to delete, and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop drop it on
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_delete_small_color.png in the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/10_general_interface_description/20_main_toolbars main toolbar .
paragraph.note: Note: Only user defined objects may be deleted. The EV_TITLED_WINDOW may not be deleted.
